original_text: And there sat a certain man at Lystra, impotent in his feet, being a cripple from his mother's womb, who never had walked:
korean_text: 루스드라에 발을 쓰지 못하는 한 사람이 앉아 있는데 나면서 걷지 못하게 되어 걸어 본 적이 없는 자라

sentences.original_text: And there sat a certain man at Lystra,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 루스트라에 어떤 남자가 앉아 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: being a cripple from his mother's womb,
